WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closed for lack of contact* User did not provide enough info, issue described should have already been fixed
WorkItem.Description: When using the preset talent it does change all items appropriately but doesn't allow the new shot rotation to calculate DPS only gives the auto shot DPS and pet DPS in ver2.3.11 and 12 and in the latest version there doesn't seem to be a way to respec a hunters talents at all the last version  to work in this regard seems to be ver2.3.10 any response to this problem would certainly help
WorkItem.Summary: [Hunter] Talent respec not allowing recalc of DPS

Comments.Message: I need your character file and a little more detail on your issue. What you describe was fixed after 2.3.11.
